Package sudoku.view

Class SudokuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • sudoku.view.SudokuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, SudokuObserver
    public class SudokuView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements SudokuObserver
    View class, represents the game-board of the model and can be used as an interface for the user to make an input.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
